ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I am a German-speaking Frontend Developer based near Hamburg. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
ABOUT.LOCATION: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively around Winsen to Lüneburg or Hamburg and remotely.
ABOUT.BULB: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT.PUZZLE: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

SKILLS-SECTION.HEADLINE: My Skills
SKILLS-SECTION.TITLE: I have gained experience in creating projects using various frontend technologies and concepts.
SKILLS-SECTION.UNDER-TEXT-HEADLINE: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PORTFOLIO-SECTION.PORTFOLIO-UNDER-HEADLINE: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
PORTFOLIO-SECTION.JOIN-UNDER-HEADLINE: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PORTFOLIO-SECTION.LOCO-UNDER-HEADLINE: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and bottles to fight against the boss chicken.
PORTFOLIO-SECTION.POKEDEX-UNDER-HEADLINE: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.

REFERENCES-SECTION.TEAM-PARTNER: Emrah consistently demonstrates exceptional reliability and a proactive, solution-oriented mindset in all collaborations. With sharp analytical skills and remarkable initiative, Emrah excels at resolving complex challenges, providing invaluable support to the team during pivotal moments. Notably, Emrah's ability to swiftly grasp new concepts and systematically drive progress toward project goals stands out as a key strength.

CONTACT-SECTION.CONTACT-DESCRIPTION: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT-SECTION.CONTACT-ME: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
